SELECT a.* FROM book a WHERE 1=1

select bookSeq ,sign ,topic ,left(introduce , 50) as shortIntro ,seq ,type ,defaultNy ,sort ,path ,originalName ,uuidName from book a join bookUploaded b on a.bookSeq = b.pSeq where 1=1 and type = 1 order by type, sort, amount desc limit 2

select bookSeq ,sign ,name ,cost*(1-sale) as price ,cost ,seq ,type ,defaultNy ,sort ,path ,originalName ,uuidName from book a join bookUploaded b on a.bookSeq = b.pSeq where 1=1 and type = 1 ORDER BY type, sort, amount desc limit 4
